features.name: Reactivity
features.description: Manages the state of an object reactively by using the objectMembrane for change detection.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Uses React's useState to maintain and update the state of the object.

features.name: Debouncing
features.description: Prevents frequent state updates by debouncing calls, improving performance.

features.name: Membrane Integration
features.description: Integrates with the objectMembrane to wrap the object and make it reactive.
